full_description:
Thermalright TL-C12B-S X3 ARGB 120mm Case Fan

The Thermalright TL-C12B-S X3 ARGB 120mm Case Fan is a versatile and high-performance cooling solution designed to enhance both the airflow and aesthetics of your computer case. Measuring a compact L120 mm x W120 mm x H25 mm and weighing only 135 grams, it's suitable for a wide range of PC setups, from compact builds to larger systems. With a rated speed of 1500 RPM±10%, this fan provides efficient cooling while maintaining a noise level of just 25.6 dBA (MAX), ensuring a quieter computing experience. Its impressive maximum airflow of 66.17 CFM (MAX) and air pressure of 1.53 mm H2O (MAX) enable effective heat dissipation and airflow through your system, preventing overheating. Operating at a low amperage of 0.20 A, it's energy-efficient while delivering exceptional cooling performance. The ARGB Port with 5V/3Pin compatibility allows for synchronized lighting effects, and the 4-Pin PWM connector makes integration easy, allowing dynamic speed control based on temperature. With an S-FDB Bearing, this fan ensures longevity, reduced friction, quieter operation, and enhanced reliability. Whether you're a gamer, PC enthusiast, or simply want to improve your system's cooling and aesthetics, the Thermalright TL-C12B-S X3 ARGB 120mm Case Fan is an excellent choice to meet your needs.

Thermalright TL-B12-S3 ARGB 120mm Case Fan

The Thermalright TL-B12-S3 ARGB 120mm Case Fan is a versatile cooling solution that seamlessly combines high-performance specifications with customizable RGB lighting. Designed with dimensions of L120 mm x W120 mm x H25 mm and weighing only 135 grams, it's a lightweight and compact addition to any PC setup. Operating at a rated speed of 1500 RPM±10%, it delivers efficient cooling with a noise level of just 28.1 dBA at maximum speed, ensuring a quiet computing experience. With an impressive airflow of 69 CFM and an air pressure of 2.87 mm H2O, this fan is ideal for cooling various components, including CPU coolers and radiators. Its 5V/3Pin ARGB port allows for synchronization with other ARGB components, while the 4-Pin PWM connector enables precise fan speed control via motherboard settings.
